short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The simple writing app that's always in your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The simple writing app that's always in your browser. All your content is private and stored only on your local device. Make sure to save it somewhere else when you're done.
